display.title: Wood Tar
description: This is the main way of getting &&9Power&&r via the &&aBiochemical&&r route. Put Logs in the &&3Pyrolyse Oven&&r for &&9Wood Tar&&r. The Charcoal you obtain can then be processed in &&3Extractors&&r for even more &&9Wood Tar&&r!
Check out the Distillation quest to see what you can do with this wondrous substance.
